result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher B Sanders was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bail applied to Surcharge.  Paid in full.
Straight time.  Sentence credit for 14 days were granted.  TIME SERVED.
Bail applied to fine.  Remainder of fine to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/01/2016 or penalty of 5 days Huber for non-payment.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Received May 5, 2016,   Affidavit of Services for Court appointed counsel and billing statement, received and filed, by Atty Sarah Ponath
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Christopher B Sanders in court with attorney Sarah A Ponath.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads no contest to count #1.  Court finds the defendant guilty of count #1.  Victim makes statements. State makes recommendations.  Attorney Ponath makes statements.  Defendant makes statements. 
The Court Orders the Following:  Count #1. 

Court orders 14 days jail.  14 days of credit. TIME SERVED. 
FINE:  $605.00 Bail to be applied
DNA Surcharge: $200.00 
DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
Total costs/fine/forfeiture:  to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/1/2016. Failure to pay;  the Court orders the defendant to serve 5 days in Huber
Plea/sentencing hearing at 04-08-2016 08:30 am
Defendant Christopher B Sanders in court with attorney Sarah A Ponath.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Hearing at 12-04-2015 09:00 am

Defendant Christopher B Sanders in court, in custody.  Ted S. Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court addresses the notification from the public defenders office.  Defendant doesn't have anyone to help him get the documents needed to the public defenders office.  Court addresses the appointment of an attorney.  Defendant requested a bail modification to have contact with the victim.  Victim is present and wishes to have contact.  State opposes.  Court appoints an attorney at the county expense.  Defendant to pay back the County.  Court reschedules this matter.  Hearing scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.
